Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.5 Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka » 3.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 3.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
124.
1303Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
<< 3.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
